uh what's this federated timeline compared to the other one
someone on an instance follows someone on another instance , the account from the second instance's toots become visible to the first instance through the federation timeline
ohhhh thank you ! !
its actually all of the toots from the second instance , not just the account that was followed . so its basically seeing the local timeline along with the timelines of other instances
